name: test_e2e_with_logs[008_SQLI_BLIND_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BLIND_004` |
| **Name** | ASCII-based character extraction |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT ASCII(SUBSTRING(user(),1,1)))>96 --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20ASCII%28SUBSTRING%28user%28%29%2C1%2C1%29%29%29%3E96%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~36000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:54:43.000 UTC

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Expected Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection` |
| **Matched Rule** | `[NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BLIND_004-1768222483112-2u8cy pattern_id=SQLI_BLIND_004 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20ASCII%28SUBSTRING%28user%28%29%2C1%2C1%29%29%29%3E96%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET` |
| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
